item.title: Kristi Noem sworn in as Department of Homeland Security secretary after Senate confirmation
item.description: After a scheduling hiccup, Kristi Noem was finally sworn in Saturday as Department of Homeland Security secretary.

item.title: Crowd caught on camera going wild after Trump stops by Las Vegas casino floor: 'USA! USA!'
item.description: President Trump walked through a casino floor Saturday shortly following a speech at the Circa Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, delighting supporters.
